name: HighsLpUtils
brief:
Utility functions for LP manipulation, I/O, and validation

Collection of free functions operating on HighsLp and related structures.

**Basis I/O:**
- writeBasisFile(): Export basis to file
- readBasisFile()/readBasisStream(): Import basis from file/stream

**Index/Name Lookup:**
- getIndexFromName(): Resolve variable/constraint name to index

**LP Assessment:**
- assessLp(): Validate LP data consistency
- lpDimensionsOk(): Check matrix dimensions
- assessCosts(): Validate objective coefficients
- assessBounds(): Validate variable/constraint bounds
- applyScalingToLp()/applyScalingToLpCol/Row(): Apply scaling factors

**LP Modification:**
- appendColsToLp(), appendRowsToLp(): Extend LP
- transformIntoEqualityProblem(): Convert to standard form

**Solution Utilities:**
- getLpCosts(), analyseObjective(): Cost analysis
- writeSolution(): Export solution to file
